attributes.action: Stop a permanent travellers site going ahead in Manby, Lincolnshire!
attributes.background:
We are two village communities living in rural Lincolnshire. 
Recently the council,without notification to the public, agreed to consider the proposal of putting up a permanent dwelling for travellers (slightly ironic) 
We do not feel as a community this is the correct location.

rejection.details:
You could raise this issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
